00039 #ifndef OPENVDB_TOOLS_POINT_ATTRIBUTE_HAS_BEEN_INCLUDED

00050 namespace OPENVDB_VERSION_NAME {

00057 
00058 template <typename PointDataTree>
00059 inline void appendAttribute(PointDataTree& tree,
00060                             const AttributeSet::Util::NameAndType& newAttribute);
00061 
00062 
00064 
00065 
00066 namespace point_attribute_internal {
00067 
00068 template<typename PointDataTreeType>
00069 struct AppendAttributeOp {
00070 
00071     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType>       LeafManagerT;
00072     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                    LeafRangeT;
00073     typedef typename PointDataTreeType::LeafNodeType            PointDataLeafNode;
00074     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor::NameAndType               NameAndType;
00075 
00076     AppendAttributeOp(  PointDataTreeType& tree,
00077                         const NameAndType& newAttribute,
00078                         AttributeSet::DescriptorPtr& descriptor)
00079         : mTree(tree)
00080         , mNewAttribute(newAttribute)
00081         , mDescriptor(descriptor) { }
00082 
00083     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const {
00084 
00085         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00086 
00087             const AttributeSet::Descriptor& expected = leaf->attributeSet().descriptor();
00088 
00089             leaf->appendAttribute(mNewAttribute, expected, mDescriptor);
00090         }
00091     }
00092 
00094 
00095     PointDataTreeType&              mTree;
00096     const NameAndType&              mNewAttribute;
00097     AttributeSet::DescriptorPtr&    mDescriptor;
00098 };
00099 
00100 } // namespace point_attribute_internal
00101 
00102 
00104 
00105 
00106 template <typename PointDataTree>
00107 inline void appendAttribute(PointDataTree& tree,
00108                             const AttributeSet::Util::NameAndType& newAttribute)
00109 {
00110     typedef AttributeSet::Util::NameAndTypeVec                    NameAndTypeVec;
00111     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                              Descriptor;
00112 
00113     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTree>             LeafManagerT;
00114     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                      LeafRangeT;
00115 
00116     using point_attribute_internal::AppendAttributeOp;
00117 
00118     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00119 
00120     if (!iter)  return;
00121 
00122     // create a new attribute descriptor
00123     NameAndTypeVec vec;
00124     vec.push_back(newAttribute);
00125 
00126     Descriptor::Ptr descriptor = iter->attributeSet().descriptor().duplicateAppend(vec);
00127 
00128     // insert attributes using the new descriptor
00129 
00130     AppendAttributeOp<PointDataTree> append(tree, newAttribute, descriptor);
00131     tbb::parallel_for(typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTree>(tree).leafRange(), append);
00132 }
